titles.title: To extend temporarily the duty on Ethyl Pyruvate, CAS Number 617-35-6.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/13/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the duty on Ethyl Pyruvate, CAS Number 617-35-6.
